text: "Piece of Me" is a 2007 pop single performed by Britney Spears. It is about a response to media scrutiny in Spears' life. The song was from her fifth studio album Blackout. It peaked at #18 on the Billboard Hot 100 and reached #1 on certain other charts. The song was released on November 27, 2007. Category:2007 songs Category:Britney Spears songs
title: Piece of Me
